## MapViewOptions.pixelRatio property

Set fixed pixel ratio for rendering. Useful when rendering on high resolution displays with low performance GPUs that may be fill-rate limited.  `window.devicePixelRatio`

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
pixelRatio?: number;
```
